## Folder structure

Files listed below will be key for curation and experimental design.

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(fs)
dir_tree()
```


- `data-checks.R`: data curation
- `randomize-season-2025.R` & `No of tuber seeds Season 2024-2025.xlsx` for design of field experiments
- `seasonal-report.qmd`: Report on each season's data

You need to have [pbwrangler](https://bokola.github.io/pbwrangler/) installed and load key libraries called in each of the .R or .qmd files.

[pbwrangler source on github](https://github.com/Bokola/pbwrangler)
